text: I wear a crown invisible and clear,&& And go my lifted royal way apart
And go my lifted royal way apart%% Since you have crowned me softly in your heart
Since you have crowned me softly in your heart%% With love that is half ardent, half austere;
With love that is half ardent, half austere;&& And as a queen disguised might pass anear
And as a queen disguised might pass anear%% The bitter crowd that barters in a mart,
The bitter crowd that barters in a mart,&& Veiling her pride while tears of pity start,
Veiling her pride while tears of pity start,&& I hide my glory thru a jealous fear.
I hide my glory thru a jealous fear.&& My crown shall stay a sweet and secret thing
My crown shall stay a sweet and secret thing%% Kept pure with prayer at evensong and morn,
Kept pure with prayer at evensong and morn,&& And when you come to take it from my head,
And when you come to take it from my head,&& I shall not weep, nor will a word be said,
I shall not weep, nor will a word be said,&& But I shall kneel before you, oh my king,
But I shall kneel before you, oh my king,&& And bind my brow forever with a thorn.
